description:
Luffy needs to think fast in order to turn the battle in his favor - filled with biscuits he debuts a new Gear Four attack that has lasting repercussions! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot find Sanji`s reflection, but can they get a message to him in time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Kraft eines vollen Magens! – Gear 4, Version Tank Man!
Le pouvoir de satiété. Une nouvelle forme du Gear Fourth, Tank man !
Manpuku no Chikara: Shin Gear Fourth Tan Man!
The Power of Satiety! A New Gear Four Form: Tank Man!
満腹の力 新ギア4[フォース]タンクマン!
